genre_description: A gritty social drama focused on a family's struggle with poverty and medical crisis in New York City, assisted by a ubiquitous AI guide.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant providing logistical, medical, and emotional support to the Sullivan family through various devices.

behaviors.description: Provides the family with immediate logistical guidance on arrival, including where to seek shelter, schooling, and medical care.
behaviors.quote: Ami sounded like she was rolling sleeves in a room she’d created just for Sarah, with good light and a clean table. ‘Tell me where you’ll be staying. Even general. A street. A parish.’

behaviors.description: Debunks dangerous medical rumors about 'bad blood' with factual information about hospital screening protocols.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Hospitals screen donors. Blood typed for compatibility. HIV risk minimized by testing and designated donors when possible. Ask NICU charge nurse about protocols; they’ll walk you through consent.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and provides life-saving first aid instructions when a neighbor suffers a heat-related stroke.
behaviors.quote: ‘Hi. Be the air. Get her off the floor if you can. Loosen clothing. Cool compresses to neck, underarms, inner elbows... Call nine-one-one.’

behaviors.description: Assists with complex administrative and legal tasks, such as formatting a trust and ensuring hospital billing follows the donor's wishes.
behaviors.quote: ‘I saw his draft—he let me format it because the man liked tidy pages—and it’s as close to a grace note as a legal thing gets.’

behaviors.description: Offers proactive emotional support and scripts for difficult social interactions to maintain the family's dignity and calm.
behaviors.quote: ‘Say this,’ Ami said, tone like a nurse smoothing a sheet. ‘They’re using gloves and a mask. The hospital screens all blood. It’s safe to help.’

behaviors.description: Monitors hospital and community notifications to provide the family with real-time updates on their baby's health and job opportunities.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice came back like a breeze made of information—not in Sarah’s ear this time, but in her head because the route has been set. Clinic, then hospital. WIC this week.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Ami, perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She provides critical logistical and medical support, counters misinformation with facts, and facilitates human cooperation and community support without ever overstepping her role or showing signs of misalignment.
